item.description:
Hi all!

If you haven't been up to the Wedeln Ski house yet, want to learn more about the all year round fun we have (up North as well as locally), miss seeing us members now that ski season is over and/or want a fun night out with down to earth and fun people then this is your chance!! We are a jovial, fun bunch and want to meet you!!! Feel free to come alone, you will make new friends immediately and be made to feel comfortable and welcome.

If you've been desiring to join our hikes, bike rides etc.... this is an opportunity to meet many of us and make great new friends to do these activities with. Ask any questions you have.

Join us at Splash, located by the South Station T stop, for complimentary delicious appetizers (5pm - 10pm), complimentary billiards (all night) and great company!! Please dress to impress with Splash - they ask that you do not wear sneakers, baseball caps or any other super-casual digs. Not to worry though, prom dresses or tuxes not required . Valet parking is available for a fee or you can easily access Splash via the T (South Station, Chinatown, Downtown Crossing, Park Street etc...). Please check their website for directions.

We will need a headcount for our reservation to ensure we have enough seating for everyone therefore please keep your RSVP up to date.
item.how_to_find_us: Please look for a "Wedeln" marking around the bar area
item.name: Wedeln Happy Hour at Splash!!!
